byline.contributor: J. David Goodman contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.

abstract: Undertaker's discovery of knife wound on body of Myrtle McKinney, 82-year-old woman found dead in Brooklyn housing complex, helped reverse conclusion that McKinney had died of natural causes and convince authorities to open murder investigation.
lead_paragraph: The New York police are investigating the killing of Myrtle McKinney, whose death certificate initially said she died of natural causes.

headline.main: Undertaker’s Discovery Turns a Brooklyn Death Into a Murder Case
headline.print_headline: An Undertaker’s Discovery Turns a Death Into a Murder Case

snippet: The New York police are investigating the killing of Myrtle McKinney, whose death certificate initially said she died of natural causes.
